detail_desc: Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck and a small, gathered stand up collar. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hips and hem. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Set with a cardigan, pair of joggers and dungarees in cotton sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in cotton jersey. Cardigan with welt front pockets, a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and ribbed hems. Dungarees with adjustable straps, covered elastication at the back and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Pyjama top and shorts in softly draping satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Shorts with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and wide legs.

Pyjama top and shorts in softly draping satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Shorts with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and wide legs.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top and a turtle neck.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top and a turtle neck.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped sleeve pocket, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, sleeveless dress in superstretch denim with narrow shoulder straps, a visible zip at the back, and a seam and detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist.

Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and large front pockets. Low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a seam with wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a lace section at the front, low-cut back and long sleeves. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jacket in soft, fast-drying pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes and a taped trim at the cuffs. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Short V-neck dress in satin with a twisted, gently draped section over the bust, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
